attributes.action: Nuclear power to generate Hydrogen for vehicles
attributes.additional_details:
We currently rely on fossil fuels for most of our transport energy needs, this is expensive and bad for the environment.

Use nuclear power to generate all of our electricity needs and extract naturally occurring Hydrogen from water.

Renewable's on their own will not produce enough energy for our needs and are very expensive.

Nuclear is cheap, relatively cheap and obtainable, act now so future generations may have enough cheap energy.
